title: Mechanical and Machinery hazards | Contact With Moving Parts of Equipment

tasks.task: Understanding and complying with safety procedures to prevent injuries from machinery moving parts
subtasks: Knowing that contact with moving parts is a leading cause of accidents
Recognizing the significant consequences of machinery-related injuries
Adhering to zero tolerance policy for moving part-related risks
Understanding the importance of machinery maintenance
Ensuring that all machinery has proper guards and safety devices
Inspecting safety devices regularly and reporting malfunctions
Not removing or blocking safety devices under any circumstances
Properly addressing maintenance needs (e.g., unplugging or removing batteries)
Properly using machinery according to training and safety rules

tasks.task: Understanding and complying with safety procedures to prevent injuries from machinery moving parts
subtasks: Knowing that contact with moving parts can result in serious injuries like death, amputations, and fractures
Recognizing the significance of adhering to zero tolerance policies for safety
Ensuring that all machinery has guards or safety devices even during operation
Regularly checking safety devices for defects or malfunctions
Reporting any issues with safety devices immediately
Not removing or blocking safety devices under any circumstances
Disconnecting power or removing batteries when performing maintenance on machinery
Properly using machinery according to training and safety guidelines
